Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its high-quality craftsmanship and unique features, we believe it's worth more than its face value. For this exceptional offering, I am proposing a price of $200. This investment will undoubtedly pay off with the benefits and convenience it brings into your life. If you're interested in learning more about how this product can elevate your daily routine, please let me know. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
